label: Sputnik 1 Launch
description: First artificial satellite launched into Earth orbit by the Soviet Union

label: Apollo 11 Mission
description: First crewed Moon landing. Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin walked on the lunar surface.

label: Voyager 1 Launch
description: Space probe launched to study the outer Solar System and interstellar space

label: Challenger Disaster
description: Space Shuttle Challenger broke apart 73 seconds after launch

label: Hubble Space Telescope Launch
description: Space telescope launched into low Earth orbit

label: ISS Expedition 1
description: First long-duration crew aboard the International Space Station

label: SpaceX Crew Dragon Demo-2
description: First crewed orbital spaceflight launched by a private company

label: James Webb Space Telescope Launch
description: Most powerful space telescope ever built, launched to observe the early universe
